question: Do you tend to overgeneralize situations?
How well do you feel you are managing work-life balance?
Can you reframe this negative thought: 'I can't handle this workload'?
choices: I can handle this if I break it down into smaller tasks
This is too much, I should just quit
There is no way out of this
I will never get through it
answer: I can handle this if I break it down into smaller tasks
